Text: Alexia's blade knocks away her opponent's.

With a CLANG, the man's sword sinks point-first into
the street.
Time to end this.
And then...
Alexia turns around.
Her voice wavers slightly as she spots fresh foes.

There are two more dark knights, both men in black
coats.
Oh, did you invite some friends?
(Too bad we can't just talk this out instead...)
However, the men silently ready their swords...
...and press forward with their attack.
Alexia blocks the first slash that bears down on her—
Then parries a strike from the second assailant.
Unh...!
Blade is met with blade.
Urgh...!!!
...But Alexia is steadily forced to give ground.
Suddenly...
...A slash from behind scores a deep cut in her side.
...Agh!
The blade is swung by the first man who had fallen.
This is how you treat a frail young maiden...?
How so very...
horrible of you!!!
Alexia deals a swift blow to her attacker.
But...he does not fall.
She presses a hand on the bleeding wound in her side.
The numbers are still three versus one.
We are the Shadow Garden...

The men encircle Alexia without emotion and begin to
close in on her.
We are the Shadow Garden...
They're going to kill me.
That's what Alexia thought.
But just then—
(A dark figure falls from the sky.)
(It descends without sound, like an owl in the night.)

(An ebony blade cleaves one of the men in two,
releasing a fountain of blood.)
(The choking stench of blood fills the alley.)
Y-You…

The man in black—Shadow—shakes the blood from his
sword with a swift motion, leaving a single line of
red on the wall.

Fools who dare to tarnish the name of the Shadow
Garden...

(Shadow. I could never forget him, that all-powerful
entity who showed me perfection with a sword.
(He's fighting the Shadow Garden...?)
You will pay for this sin with your lives.
Ugh...

The men in black spring into action at Shadow's
words.

Their decision is instantaneous. They flee from the
street to the walls, then to the rooftops.
A witless choice...
Wait!
Shadow stops.

If he so wishes, he could take Alexia's life
right then and there.
I am Alexia Midgar. Princess of this kingdom.

What...What is it you seek? To what end do you wield
such power? What are you fighting...?
And...do you intend harm toward this kingdom?
Shadow slowly turns around and appraises Alexia.
Don't get involved. For you, ignorance is bliss.
Shadow's coat dances behind him.
Ah! St-Stop...
Wait, if you...
...are...our enemy...
...then...

Alexia collapses onto the ground, losing consciousness
from blood loss.
